Name: Marquee
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Raspberry and bourbon combine perfectly in this short, slightly sweet, fruity drink.
History: Created in 1998 by Giovanni Burdi at Match EC1, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Marquee contains 214 calories
